description: Gets the LOA-CFA for a connection. The Letter of Authorization - Connecting Facility Assignment (LOA-CFA) is a document that your APN partner or service provider uses when establishing your cross connect to Amazon Web Services at the colocation facility. For more information, see Requesting Cross Connects at Direct Connect Locations in the Direct Connect User Guide.

nested_items.name: loaContent
nested_items.description: The binary contents of the LOA-CFA document.

nested_items.name: loaContentType
nested_items.description: The standard media type for the LOA-CFA document. The only supported value is application/pdf.
